Value.label: LED mode
Value.Help: Synchronization of load power and LED indicator

Value.label: Instant Energy Autosend Interval
Value.Help: How often to send the energy report for the moment-in-time usage (METER_REPORT version) automatically in minutes. 0 = disabled.

Value.label: Instant Multilevel Autosend Interval
Value.Help: How often to send the energy report for the moment-in-time usage (SENSOR_MULTILEVEL_REPORT version) automatically in minutes. 0 = disabled.

Value.label: Accumulated Energy Autosend Interval
Value.Help: How often to send the energy report for the accumulated energy usage usage (METER_REPORT) automatically in minutes. 0 = disabled.

Value.label: Wattage Change Notifications
Value.Help: Enable automatic notifications when there is a change in wattage.

Value.label: Wattage Change Threshold
Value.Help: How much the wattage needs to change by to trigger the wattage change notifications. Units are 1-10th of a watt; 0-255: 0.0-25.5W
